ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In cases where Hymn is needed I will weave it regards of the finger-wiggler whining :)  I have been pulsing Hymn then two pulses of Clarity then Hymn
ygData.messageBody:
>From: jhenders@...
>On Mon, Oct 04/99, Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...> wrote:
> > From: Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...>
> >
> > > From: jhenders@...
> > >
> > > Which allows you to trade 3 hp for one mana point. Unless you have
>regen
> > > or a paladin topped up on mana to heal the person using it, it's
> > > useless.
> > >
> > Don't forget a bard to heal :) I had a shaman using a spell similar
> > to that last night. The first time he did it, we were all a bit scared
>when
> > we saw his hps go from full to one bubble real quickly.
> >
>
>At lower levels (where you'll never get a mana stone unless you are a
>twink) After 32 it's a rare party that wants the heal song, even woven
>with the mana song. (partly because thanks to Verant not bothering with
>an icon, no one believes that the mana song lasts 3 ticks)
>
>--
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
> GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
> b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
>

In cases where Hymn is needed I will weave it regards of the finger-wiggler
whining :) I have been pulsing Hymn then two pulses of Clarity then Hymn
again. It keeps everyone happy and the cleric does not have to top everyone
off.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
